# Revolutionary Communist Group of Colombia

Revolutionary Communist Group of Colombia () (RCGC) is a communist group in Colombia. It was founded in 1982, by a group originating in the Marxistâ€“Leninist League of Colombia. It is a founding member of the Revolutionary Internationalist Movement.[http://www.revolucionobrera.com/documentos/informe/14.htm Informe Poltitico]
